marketplaces.name: yw-claude-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Claude marketplace with custom plugins and skills

files.plugins/yw-visualizer/README.md:
# yw-visualizer Plugin

A visualization plugin for Claude marketplace demonstrating hello world skills.

## Installation

```
/plugin install yw-visualizer@yw-claude-marketplace
```

## Features

- Hello skill: A simple greeting skill to demonstrate the plugin system

## Skills

### hello

A simple greeting skill that demonstrates basic skill functionality.

To use this skill, you can reference it when you need visualization capabilities.

plugins.name: yw-visualizer
